mapper.sql: id, avatar, account, password, salt, name, birthday, sex, email, phone, role_id, dept_id, status, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, version
mapper.update: update sys_user set status = #{status} where id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS id,b.`name` AS `name`,b.basics_type_id AS basicsTypeId, (CASE WHEN (b.id in (SELECT r.basics_id FROM user_basics_relation r WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}) ) THEN true ELSE false END) as state FROM basics b where state = 'ENABLE'

SELECT u.*,d.full_name AS deptName,GROUP_CONCAT(r.`name`) AS roleName FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON FIND_IN_SET(r.id,u.role_id) LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id where u.status != 'DELETED'
and (u.account like CONCAT('%',#{user.name},'%') or u.name like CONCAT('%',#{user.name},'%'))
and (u.dept_id = #{user.deptId} or u.dept_id in ( select id from sys_dept where pids like CONCAT('%$[', #{user.deptId}, '$]%') escape '$' ))
${user.params.dataScope} GROUP BY u.id order by u.create_time desc
